## Creazione identity pool
per autorizzare le chiamate anonime del web sull'apigateway

```JSON
{
"Version": "2012-10-17",
"Statement": [
    {
    "Effect": "Allow",
    "Action": [
        "cognito-identity:GetCredentialsForIdentity"
    ],
    "Resource": [
        "*"
    ]
    }
]
}
```




Chiamato:

## Login
https://grapp-up2.auth.us-east-1.amazoncognito.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=27seff36mnnrh90v38br5frmm6&response_type=token&scope=email+openid&redirect_uri=http%3A%2F%2Flocalhost

## Response
http://localhost:4200/home#

## Logout
https://grapp-up2.auth.us-east-1.amazoncognito.com/logout?client_id=27seff36mnnrh90v38br5frmm6&logout_uri=http://localhost:4200


https://grapp-up2.auth.us-east-1.amazoncognito.com/logout?client_id=27seff36mnnrh90v38br5frmm6&redirect_uri=http://localhost:4200
